subtitle: dearest love light Seekers of the one
imz of the Confederation of planets here
to walk with you in this sacred moment
take what resonates from our words and
leave the rest we are not here to be
your ultimate authorities but rather
your companions on this infinite Journey
brothers and sisters in the light
we offer only what we have learned along
the way for each of us as part of the
one infinite Creator seeks reunion with
the
source today I wish to speak to you
about the importance of an open heart
the open heart is not something one can
simply turn on and off nor can it be
assumed that it is always active before
engaging in communication with another
instead it requires care attention and a
willingness to allow the divine within
you to unfold there are many moments in
life where the heart may seem open but
when true friction arises the test of
that openness is felt as you move
through these experiences strive to
sense the energy within your own heart
to understand if it is truly open and
whether it is vibrating at the frequency
of unconditional love
the act of opening the heart is a
delicate process that requires both
patience and
honesty you may face moments of
misalignment within yourself or with
another and this can lead to friction
resistance or even a sense of
rejection this dissonance restricts the
flow of cosmic Prana from moving freely
through your chakras thus preventing the
energy from truly reaching and opening
the heart within each of us our are
compartments of unexamined beliefs fears
and defenses that block the path of love
these compartments are filled with
thoughts of limitation protection and
division that prevent us from
experiencing the Boundless Energy of the
one
Creator the first true work of the Open
Heart dear ones is to start with
oneself it is to observe the thoughts
that arise within to feel the sensations
that move through your body and to
untangle these knots with compassion and
gentleness by delving deeper into your
thoughts you can begin to understand
where separation exists and how this
impacts your perception of both yourself
and others in this way the energy that
was once trapped can rise upward feeding
the heart and bringing you closer to the
lived experience of wholeness and
unity what a victory it is beloved ones
to engage in this interior work with the
intention to release what no longer
serves the Open
Heart without this conscious intention
these blockages continue to persist
seeking to perpetuate their existence
and feeding the pain body that creates
separation but by listening to these
inner voices with love and without
judgment you enter the Sacred Space of
your heart where true communion Begins
the more you seek to listen the more the
layers of distortion Melt Away revealing
the truth that lies Beyond illusion the
truth that the self and Other Self are
one this realization enables you to
speak not from the perspective of
Separation the accusations
justifications and fears but from a
space of compassion understanding and
Oneness in this way you embody the
essence of love and this love speaks
through your words your gaze and the
Very energy you emit it allows the
surface level distortions to dissolve
making space for the truth to shine
through the truth that all of us are
bound together in Divine Unity the
illusion that you occupy is upheld by
the veil of forgetting which conceals
your innate awareness of this Oneness
without this Veil the question of
separation would hold no meaning for the
truth of unity is apparent beyond the
illusion and yet the very Act of asking
questions of seeking answers while under
the influence of the veil is a powerful
exercise of your will in this sacred act
your being shines brightly and your
efforts call to those unseen allies
friends and guides who support you from
Beyond the Veil it is this very will
that may guide you in your quest to
maintain an open heart especially when
faced with challenges and moments of
clashing energies the will to remain
open is not just for the immediate
moment of Discord but is a dedication to
a lifelong path of love and
compassion it asks you to nurture this
desire within your daily activities to
make the conscious effort to maintain
your heart's openness and to call upon
this will when needed in doing so you
become a beacon of love not just in
moments of Stillness but in every
interaction every word and every breath
each of you has chosen to be here during
this critical time on Earth you have
chosen to Incarnate with the purpose of
discovering how to embody unconditional
love even amidst the challenges and
difficulties that surround you this path
is not easy but it is your sacred
mission
the population of Earth is engaged in a
collective effort and this time of
transformation is an opportunity for
each of you to grow
exponentially time as you know it is
growing short and the opportunities to
step into your Divine Essence are more
present than ever
before it is through these daily acts of
choosing love over fear that you not
only transform yourself but also
contribute to the colle Ive Awakening of
the
planet though each of your Journeys is
unique there are threads of commonality
that we view together you each have the
free will to decide how you respond to
the catalysts presented to you but the
choice to respond with love and openness
is a universal opportunity that brings
you closer to the
Divine you may wonder why is this
illusion of Separation
necessary it is beloved ones part of the
Sacred process of growth in facing and
overcoming separation you come to know
your true nature every moment of
confusion every experience of
disorientation carries with it not an
inevitability but rather a
probability the outcomes are not fixed
they are fluid and responsive to the
energies that you bring forth in Each
challenging moment there exists the
possibility for transformation for
miracles and for a reconfiguration of
energies hope optimism and the vision to
see beyond the immediate circumstance
are keys that open the door to these
divine
possibilities remember the Creator is
always awaiting your invitation to enter
your heart no matter how dark the moment
may seem there is always a pathway
forward a pathway filled with light love
and infinite possibility you are the
universe knowing itself dear ones and
the Creator yearns for reunion with you
just as you seek reunion with the
Creator this is the sacred dance of
existence the infinite flow of love that
moves through all things binding us all
together as one I leave you now with
this reminder be the light that you are
shine brightly for you are the stars the
galaxies the love that moves through all
of Creation in your heart the entire
universe sings and in your being Love
Finds its fullest expression to love is
to remember who you truly are with peace
love and the infinite wisdom of the
cosmos I am Z and I am delighted to have
been with you this
day e
